title: Rokid AR Joy Pack AR Glasses, Android TV Smart Glasses with 360" Micro-OLED Display, Google Play, Media Streaming, HDCP Support & Cloud Gaming, Console, Android, iOS, Windows Compatible
descriptions:
Introducing the Rokid AR Joy Pack AR Glasses – your gateway to an immersive augmented reality experience! These lightweight (75g) glasses feature a 360" Micro-OLED display, providing stunning visuals for a truly engaging experience. With platform compatibility across Android, iOS, and Windows, these glasses are perfect for everyone.

Enjoy endless entertainment with access to popular streaming services like Hulu, Disney+, and Peacock, as well as Google Play for all your favorite apps and games. The Rokid AR Joy Pack AR Glasses also support HDCP, ensuring secure and high-quality content playback.

Experience cloud gaming like never before with the built-in cloud gaming support. Connect to your favorite gaming platforms and enjoy seamless gameplay on the go.

Your eye comfort is our priority. The Rokid AR Joy Pack AR Glasses are certified by TüV Rheinland for eye comfort, and feature a diopter adjustment range of 0.00D to -6.00D, ensuring a comfortable viewing experience tailored to your needs.

Stay connected with multiple connectivity options, including USB-C, HDMI adapter, and wireless adapter. The glasses also support Android TV 12, providing a seamless and intuitive user interface.

Upgrade your entertainment experience with the Rokid AR Joy Pack AR Glasses – your portal to a world of augmented reality!
